templates.name: How are they packaged? / Can I give this as a gift?
templates.content:
All orders are shipped with one complimentary White + Warren cotton branded dustbag per order, making an excellent presentation for gifting and storing the cashmere.

The hang tag attached to the garments doesn't have any price indication, it simply shows the style name, color, and size if applicable. Each order is sent with a simple packing slip that doesn't denote the price paid, discounts applied, etc on the slip. The packing slip also includes instructions for return or exchange if you need to exchange it for something different.

templates.name: Rewards / referral program
templates.content: We have a referral program where you give 20% off to your friend and get 20% off for yourself. Check it out here - https://www.whiteandwarren.com/pages/refer-a-friend

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: http://instagram.com/whiteandwarren/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/WhiteandWarren/

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 877-887-7707 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Start / Initiate Return
templates.content: You can start a return here: https://returns.whiteandwarren.com/

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address, and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at wholesale@whiteandwarren.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customerservice@whiteandwarren.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://www.whiteandwarren.com/pages/store-locator

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Orders placed before 1PM EST on business days are shipped on the same day. Once shipped, it will take 7-10 business days for domestic orders. If you're interested, we also have other options for faster shipping which you can learn more about here: https://bit.ly/3PD7S7F

templates.name: Do you have an e-Gift Card?
templates.content: Yes, we do! You can click here to purchase an e-Gift Card: https://www.whiteandwarren.com/products/gift-card

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.whiteandwarren.com/pages/customer-service#returns-exchanges

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.whiteandwarren.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at customerservice@whiteandwarren.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! Our clothes generally run true to size. Would you mind sharing your usual size?

templates.name: How do I return a gift?
templates.content: You can click here to return a gift: https://returns.whiteandwarren.com/gifts

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on orders over $325. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.whiteandwarren.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Escalation template
templates.content: Could I have your order number and email address? Also, please keep in mind that our business hours are M 10am-6pm, Tue-Thu 9am-6pm, F 9am-1pm EST .

templates.name: Do you do price adjustments?
templates.content: We are happy to honor price adjustments for items purchased within 7 days of a price markdown. Adjustments are made upon the customer's request one time per order while items are still in stock. Price adjustments for items that were purchased using a promotional code will be adjusted from the original selling price, excluding promotional discounts.
